features: PREMIUM MATERIALS- Crafted with care, our ear hole pillow features high-density 50D green color memory foam that contours to your head, providing excellent support and comfort. The outer cover is made of luxurious 250gsm grey color bamboo knitted fabric with a convenient zipper for easy cleaning.
TINNITUS RELIEF- Our pillow with ear hole for side sleepers provides a specialized ear hole that helps reduce ear noises, allowing you to find relief and enjoy peaceful nights, night after night.

RESTFUL SLEEP- Experience ultimate comfort and uninterrupted sleep with our innovative ear pillows for side sleepers, designed to accommodate ear piercings and earbuds. No more compromising on your sleep quality!

VERSATILE- Our piercing pillow for side sleepers is designed to accommodate your needs whether you have ear piercings or prefer using earbuds while sleeping. Experience the convenience of sleeping comfortably without compromising your style or preferences.

WAKE UP REFRESHED- Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to rejuvenating sleep! Our pillow with ear hole ensures optimal relaxation, waking you up refreshed and ready to take on the day. Invest in your sleep and experience the difference for yourself!
body.description: "Introducing our revolutionary ear pillow with hole in center is the ultimate solution for achieving restful sleep, providing relief for tinnitus, and accommodating your ear piercings or earbuds. With its innovative design and premium features, this pillow will transform your sleep experience and enhance your overall well-being. At the heart of our Ear Pillow lies its exceptional quality and comfort. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the pillow features high-density 50D green color memory foam that conforms to the contours of your head, providing optimal support and eliminating pressure points. Experience the luxury of sinking into a cloud-like pillow cradling your head and neck, allowing you to drift off into a deep, peaceful slumber. One of the standout features of our Ear Pillow is its specially designed ear hole. Measuring 7*11cm, this thoughtfully engineered opening allows individuals with ear piercings to sleep comfortably without discomfort or irritation. Additionally, if you prefer earbuds while sleeping, our pillow ensures a perfect fit, eliminating the need to adjust or readjust throughout the night. So say goodbye to tangled wires or discomfort caused by poorly fitting earbuds. For those suffering from tinnitus, our Ear Pillow provides much-needed relief. The strategically placed ear hole reduces ear noises, allowing you to enjoy a more serene sleep environment. No more tossing and turning due to unwanted disturbances. Instead, wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, ready to tackle the day with newfound energy and clarity. Not only does our Ear Pillow excel in functionality, but it also boasts exceptional quality in its materials. The outer cover is made of premium 250gsm grey color bamboo knitted fabric, known for its softness, breathability, and hypoallergenic properties. The body is also equipped with a convenient zipper, enabling easy removal and cleaning, ensuring a fresh and hygienic sleep surface. "

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have slept so much better since purchasing this pillow. Goodbye, ear pain! I wish there was an option for a larger size, however, this size would be perfect for traveling. Additionally, at this size, I am still very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It would only be better if the hole went all the way thru but still works great and eat no longer hurts! It was smaller than I expected and wasn’t sure it would work and be comfortable but it is fine and works perfectly!
